commands.name: help
commands.description: Display all available commands

commands.name: ping
commands.description: Check bot latency and response time

commands.name: shutdown
commands.description: Gracefully shutdown the bot (Owner only)

commands.name: features
commands.description: View all bot features and current settings

commands.name: viewsettings
commands.description: View all current server settings (Admin only)

commands.name: toggle
commands.description: Toggle features on/off (Admin only)

commands.name: resetmessages
commands.description: Reset welcome/leave messages to default (Admin only)

commands.name: logs
commands.description: Open interactive server logging panel (Admin only)

commands.name: update
commands.description: Pull latest code from GitHub and restart bot (Owner only)
